trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents information about C# dynamic operations that are specific to particular arguments at a call site.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx X$ xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Instances of this class are generated by the C# compiler.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx X$ xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The argument is passed to an out parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The argument is passed to a ref parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The argument's compile-time type should be considered during binding.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx$x xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x
